meanings.definition: A fish that lives in caves.
meanings.sent1: The cavefish swam gracefully in the dark cave.
meanings.sent2: I saw a rare cavefish while exploring the underground cavern.
meanings.sent3: Why did the cavefish bring a flashlight to the underwater party?
meanings.sent4: The cavefish, a true explorer, navigated the depths of the cave like a seasoned adventurer.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the cavefish illuminated the murky waters.

meanings.sent1: We decided to cavefish for our dinner in the hidden grotto.
meanings.sent2: He loves to cavefish on weekends, searching for new species in the underground rivers.
meanings.sent3: The friends planned to cavefish, but ended up catching only old boots.
meanings.sent4: She cavefishes with skill, hooking the elusive cave-dwelling creatures.
meanings.sent5: Cavefishing requires patience and a good headlamp to see in the darkness.
